title: Bayesian spatio-temporal disease mapping of COVID-19 ...
summary: This post discusses spatio-temporal analysis and modeling, specifically mentioning a "Spatio-temporal Poisson ANOVA model" for understanding disease patterns. It focuses on how spatial and temporal interactions reveal disease routes and patterns over time and across spatial units.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because it directly mentions "Spatio-temporal Poisson ANOVA model", which is highly relevant to "Spatio Temporal" and "Point Process" (Poisson processes are a type of point process).
